name: Celestial Force: Magical Mayhem
description:
Celestial Force: Magical Mayhem is a beat'em up game where magical girls must defend the Earth from an alien invasion.
The Celestial Force is being summoned to deal with the terrible Plutonians and prevent our planet from being taken by the forces of evil.

Help the girls to battle their enemies and free the city from the aliens nefarious influence. Choose your magical combatent to face the invaders using their elemental-adjacent powers and a lot of glitter!

WHAT YOU CAN DO

  • Choose your favorite Magical Girl with a unique combat style.
  • Play with a friend to beat the invaders.
  • Complete several events with different results.
  • Defeat powerful bosses.


  • Two playable characters, for single player and local coop: Violetta and Atsuko.
  • Two complete levels, with their respective bosses.
  • 8 different enemies, with 3 unique models.
  • 2 bosses with models, animations and unique effects.
  • Hand-drawed in-game comics to tell the story from the point of view of each of the girls.


  • New characters, with new combat styles and unique stories.
  • New levels, deepening the story in different scenarios.
  • New bosses, with unique designs and combat styles.
  • More events throughout the game.
  • Steam Achievements!
  • General improvements and bug fixes.
